scripts.deploy:dev: export DB_SECRET_ARN=`grep DB_SECRET_ARN ../.env.dev | cut -d '=' -f 2`; npx serverless deploy --aws-profile default --stage dev
scripts.deploy:stg: export DB_SECRET_ARN=`grep DB_SECRET_ARN ../.env.stg | cut -d '=' -f 2`; npx serverless deploy --aws-profile default --stage stg
scripts.deploy:prd: export DB_SECRET_ARN=`grep DB_SECRET_ARN ../.env.prd | cut -d '=' -f 2`; npx serverless deploy --aws-profile default --stage prd
